Global Extensions

Extensions and methods that reside in the global namespace

Function $evaluate(value) Evaluate and return value if it is a Function, otherwise just return it.

Functions

toInteger()

CIP’s integer parsing function.  Used by CIResizeBehavior and CIRect.

Returns

the Number or null if not a number (NaN)

function $S(s)

Tests to see if the object (usually a String) is not null and is not empty

Parameters

stringString to test

Returns

true or false

toInteger()

CIP’s integer parsing function.  Used by CIResizeBehavior and CIRect.

Returns

the Number or null if not a number (NaN)

withEntityCharsDecoded()

Resolves HTML entity characters in a string

Returns

the decoded string

withEntityCharsEncoded()

Converts &, “, <, > to HTML entity characters in a string

Returns

the encoded string

function $S(s)
Tests to see if the object (usually a String) is not null and is not empty
CIResizeBehavior allows a CIRect to calculate the integer value of a target variable at any given time by delegating the retrieval of the variable to a function.
A CIRect defines the size, origin, clipping and positioning for an object, usually a CIView.
